title: Establishes the crimes of endangering the welfare of a child in the first and second degrees, a class E felony and a class A misdemeanor, respectively
summary: Establishes the crimes of endangering the welfare of a child in the first and second degrees, a class E felony and a class A misdemeanor, respectively; provides a defense and that arrest is not necessary for the second degree crime when the conduct is justifiable.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to endangering the welfare of a child
